title: Welcome to Intro Data Science
Welcome to Intro Data Science
text:
Code

# Use code chunk option fig-align: center to center the plot. 
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, 
                            color = species)) + 
         geom_point() + 
  labs(x = "Flipper Length (in mm)",y = "Body Mass (in g)",
       title = "Flipper length vs. body mass",
       subtitle = "Penguins at Palmer Station, Antartica") +
  scale_color_viridis_d()

title: Welcome to Intro Data Science
text:
Images

Artwork by @allison_horst

title: Welcome to Intro Data Science
text:
Columns


Calculate the proportion of penguins from each species.


penguins |>
  count(species) |>
  mutate(prop  = n / sum(n))

# A tibble: 3 √ó 3
  species       n  prop
  <fct>     <int> <dbl>
1 Adelie      152 0.442
2 Chinstrap    68 0.198
3 Gentoo      124 0.360

title: Welcome to Intro Data Science
text:
Panels

PlotCode



penguins |>
  filter(species == "Adelie", !is.na(sex)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, color = sex)) + 
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Flipper Length (in mm)",y = "Body Mass (in g)",
       title = "Flipper length vs. body mass",
       subtitle = "Adelie Penguins at Palmer Station, Antartica") +
  scale_color_viridis_d() + 
  facet_wrap(~island)











penguins |>
  filter(species == "Adelie", !is.na(sex)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, color = sex)) + 
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Flipper Length (in mm)",y = "Body Mass (in g)",
       title = "Flipper length vs. body mass",
       subtitle = "Adelie Penguins at Palmer Station, Antartica") +
  scale_color_viridis_d() + 
  facet_wrap(~island)

November 16, 9am - November 16: 11:59pm

title: Informa√ß√µes importantes
text:
Objetivos do programa
Ao final das 15 semanas do Pesquisa para Elas, voc√™ ir√°‚Ä¶

Desenvolver habilidades para compreender e aplicar a abordagem sistem√°tica da metodologia cient√≠fica em suas pesquisas, incluindo a formula√ß√£o de quest√µes, defini√ß√£o de hip√≥teses e sele√ß√£o de m√©todos apropriados.
Adquirir experi√™ncia pr√°tica em diferentes fases da pesquisa, desde a coleta at√© a an√°lise de dados, passando pela manipula√ß√£o eficaz de informa√ß√µes, realiza√ß√£o de an√°lise explorat√≥ria e utiliza√ß√£o de modelagem preditiva.
Aprender a comunicar de maneira clara e eficaz os resultados de suas pesquisas, seja por meio de trabalhos escritos que seguem padr√µes acad√™micos ou na apresenta√ß√£o do projeto final de forma coesa e acess√≠vel.

title: Informa√ß√µes importantes
text:
Recursos

Communica√ß√£o
All lecture notes, assignment instructions, an up-to-date schedule, and other course materials may be found on the course website.
Announcements will be emailed through Sakai Announcements periodically. Please check your email regularly to ensure you have the latest announcements for the course.

title: Informa√ß√µes importantes
text:
Tarefas semanais

Mentoria
In labs, you will apply the concepts discussed in lecture to various data analysis scenarios, with a focus on the computation.


Exams
There will be two, take-home, open-note exams. Through these exams you have the opportunity to demonstrate what you‚Äôve learned in the course thus far.


Simp√≥sio
The purpose of the final project is to apply what you‚Äôve learned throughout the semester to analyze an interesting data-driven research question.


Atrasos e ausencias
The due dates for assignments are there to help you keep up with the course material and to ensure the teaching team can provide feedback within a timely manner. We understand that things come up periodically that could make it difficult to submit an assignment by the deadline. Note that the lowest homework and lab assignment will be dropped to accommodate such circumstances.


Desligamento do programa

text:
